original: Lundell, Johan Wiktor, rektor, Borgholm, f. 18/8/87 i Ö. Strö, Mal-möh. 1., av folkskoll Jöns L. o. Johanna Månsson. G. 17 m. Julia Tillman. Barn: Stig f. 18, Maj 20, Nils 23. — Stud:ex. i Lund 07, fil. kand. 11, fil mag. 13. Resa t. Tyskl 30. Vik. adj. i Karlshamn 08, e. lär. i Halmstad part. 11, vik. adj. i Vänersb. 13, lär. v. Eslövs samsk. 14-15, ord. lär. o. förest, f. Borgholms h. folksk. 15, rektor f. Borgholms komm. mell:-sk. 18, adj. i matem., fysik o. kemi v. Borgholms samrealsk. 31, rektor där sed. s. å. Led. av Borgholms stads-fullm. 23, ordf. 28-31, v. ordf. 43-46, ordf. i stadsistyr. 31-38, folksk :styr. 27-30 o. tax:ndn 23-44, led. av o. v. ordf. i styr. f. Borgholms Sparbank sed. 25. RVO 39.
translated: Lundell, Johan Wiktor, principal, Borgholm, b. 18/8/87 in Ö. Strö, Mal-möh. 1st, son of elementary school teacher Jöns L. and Johanna Månsson. Married on 17th with Julia Tillman. Children: Stig b. 18, May 20, Nils 23. — Graduated from Lund University with a Bachelor's Degree in 1907, Bachelor of Arts in 1911, Master of Arts in 1913. Traveled to Germany in 1930. Substitute assistant teacher in Karlshamn from 1908, permanent teacher in Halmstad from 1911, substitute assistant teacher in Vänersborg from 1913, teacher at Eslöv private school from 1914-1915, regular teacher and headmaster of Borgholm elementary school from 1915, principal of Borgholm community middle school from 1918, assistant teacher of mathematics, physics, and chemistry at Borgholm secondary school from 1931, principal there since the same year. Member of Borgholm city council from 1923, chairman from 1928-1931, vice chairman from 1943-1946, chairman of the city board from 1931-1938, member of the elementary school board from 1927-1930, member of the tax committee from 1923-1944, member and vice chairman of the board of Borgholm Savings Bank since 1925. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO) in 1939.
